Sentencas: In recent years, Denmark boosted investments in renewable energy and electrification of transportation.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: The Danish Agenda proposed that all primary energy consumption will be covered by renewable sources such as wind, biomass and solar by 2050.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: These changes require significant investment and re-thinking of entire energy infrastructures and types of consumption.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: The Agenda also suggested, among other things, improving the efficiency of energy systems.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: In this paper, the interactions between charging an electric car and an innovative cogeneration system for household application (micro-solid oxide fuel cell with an integrated healing system) are investigated.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: The charge of the electric car by the cogenerator produces waste heat that can be used to partially cover the heat demand of the house.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: In this way it may be possible to increase overall efficiency and decrease total energy costs.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: Different innovative strategies are proposed and analyzed to manage charging an electric car and efficiently using the waste heat available.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: The aims of this study are to make the system grid-independent, to decrease the thermal stress of SOFCs and to determine the nominal power of an integrated heating system.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate

Sentencas: The results show energy efficiency and economic profitability of the system, even if subsidies are not included.
Titulo: Combined micro-cogeneration and electric vehicle system for household application: An energy and economic analysis in a Northern European climate
